field.name: CRMODE
field.description: Delta Modulator Conversion Resolution. - Value, Description 0x00, DM10 - 10-bit delta modulator 0x01, DM12 - 12-bit delta modulator 0x02, DM14 - 14-bit delta modulator 0x03, DM16 - 16-bit delta modulator

field.name: DMGRDIS
field.description: Delta Modulation Gain Step Reduction Disable

field.name: IDACIREFS
field.description: Current DAC and Reference Current Scale

field.name: SCANMODE
field.description: Configure scan mode - Value, Description 0x00, PERIODIC - A new scan is started each time the period counter overflows 0x01, ONESHOT - A single scan is performed when START in CMD is set 0x02, PRS - Pulse on PRS channel

field.name: PRSSEL
field.description: Scan start PRS select - Value, Description 0x00, PRSCH0 - PRS Channel 0 selected as input 0x01, PRSCH1 - PRS Channel 1 selected as input 0x02, PRSCH2 - PRS Channel 2 selected as input 0x03, PRSCH3 - PRS Channel 3 selected as input 0x04, PRSCH4 - PRS Channel 4 selected as input 0x05, PRSCH5 - PRS Channel 5 selected as input 0x06, PRSCH6 - PRS Channel 6 selected as input 0x07, PRSCH7 - PRS Channel 7 selected as input 0x08, PRSCH8 - PRS Channel 8 selected as input 0x09, PRSCH9 - PRS Channel 9 selected as input 0x0A, PRSCH10 - PRS Channel 10 selected as input 0x0B, PRSCH11 - PRS Channel 11 selected as input

field.name: SCANCONF
field.description: Select scan configuration - Value, Description 0x00, DIRMAP - The channel configuration register registers used are directly mapped to the channel number. 0x01, INVMAP - The channel configuration register registers used are CHX+8_CONF for channels 0-7 and CHX-8_CONF for channels 8-15. 0x02, TOGGLE - The channel configuration register registers used toggles between CHX_CONF and CHX+8_CONF when channel x triggers 0x03, DECDEF - The decoder state defines the CONF registers to be used.

field.name: BUFIDL
field.description: Result buffer interrupt and DMA trigger level

field.name: DMAWU
field.description: DMA wake-up from EM2 - Value, Description 0x00, DISABLE - No DMA wake-up from EM2 0x01, BUFDATAV - DMA wake-up from EM2 when data is valid in the result buffer 0x02, BUFLEVEL - DMA wake-up from EM2 when the result buffer is full/half-full depending on BUFIDL configuration

field.name: AUXPRESC
field.description: Prescaling factor for high frequency timer - Value, Description 0x00, DIV1 - High frequency timer is clocked with AUXHFRCO/1 0x01, DIV2 - High frequency timer is clocked with AUXHFRCO/2 0x02, DIV4 - High frequency timer is clocked with AUXHFRCO/4 0x03, DIV8 - High frequency timer is clocked with AUXHFRCO/8

field.name: LFPRESC
field.description: Prescaling factor for low frequency timer - Value, Description 0x00, DIV1 - Low frequency timer is clocked with LFACLKLESENSE/1 0x01, DIV2 - Low frequency timer is clocked with LFACLKLESENSE/2 0x02, DIV4 - Low frequency timer is clocked with LFACLKLESENSE/4 0x03, DIV8 - Low frequency timer is clocked with LFACLKLESENSE/8 0x04, DIV16 - Low frequency timer is clocked with LFACLKLESENSE/16 0x05, DIV32 - Low frequency timer is clocked with LFACLKLESENSE/32 0x06, DIV64 - Low frequency timer is clocked with LFACLKLESENSE/64 0x07, DIV128 - Low frequency timer is clocked with LFACLKLESENSE/128

field.name: PCPRESC
field.description: Period counter prescaling - Value, Description 0x00, DIV1 - The period counter clock frequency is LFACLKLESENSE/1 0x01, DIV2 - The period counter clock frequency is LFACLKLESENSE/2 0x02, DIV4 - The period counter clock frequency is LFACLKLESENSE/4 0x03, DIV8 - The period counter clock frequency is LFACLKLESENSE/8 0x04, DIV16 - The period counter clock frequency is LFACLKLESENSE/16 0x05, DIV32 - The period counter clock frequency is LFACLKLESENSE/32 0x06, DIV64 - The period counter clock frequency is LFACLKLESENSE/64 0x07, DIV128 - The period counter clock frequency is LFACLKLESENSE/128

field.name: ACMP0MODE
field.description: ACMP0 mode - Value, Description 0x00, DISABLE - LESENSE does not control ACMP0 0x01, MUX - LESENSE controls the input mux (POSSEL) of ACMP0 0x02, MUXTHRES - LESENSE controls the input mux (POSSEL) and the threshold value (VDDLEVEL) of ACMP0

field.name: ACMP1MODE
field.description: ACMP1 mode - Value, Description 0x00, DISABLE - LESENSE does not control ACMP1 0x01, MUX - LESENSE controls the input mux (POSSEL) of ACMP1 0x02, MUXTHRES - LESENSE controls the input mux and the threshold value (VDDLEVEL) of ACMP1

field.name: WARMUPMODE
field.description: ACMP and VDAC duty cycle mode - Value, Description 0x00, NORMAL - The analog comparators and VDAC are shut down when LESENSE is idle 0x01, KEEPACMPWARM - The analog comparators are kept powered up when LESENSE is idle 0x02, KEEPDACWARM - The VDAC is kept powered up when LESENSE is idle 0x03, KEEPACMPDACWARM - The analog comparators and VDAC are kept powered up when LESENSE is idle

field.name: SAMPLE
field.description: Select sample mode - Value, Description 0x00, ACMPCOUNT - Counter output will be used in evaluation 0x01, ACMP - ACMP output will be used in evaluation 0x02, ADC - ADC output will be used in evaluation 0x03, ADCDIFF - Differential ADC output will be used in evaluation

field.name: SETIF
field.description: Enable interrupt generation - Value, Description 0x00, NONE - No interrupt is generated 0x01, LEVEL - Set interrupt flag if the sensor triggers. 0x02, POSEDGE - Set interrupt flag on positive edge of the sensor state 0x03, NEGEDGE - Set interrupt flag on negative edge of the sensor state 0x04, BOTHEDGES - Set interrupt flag on both edges of the sensor state

field.name: EXMODE
field.description: Set GPIO mode - Value, Description 0x00, DISABLE - Disabled 0x01, HIGH - Push Pull, GPIO is driven high 0x02, LOW - Push Pull, GPIO is driven low 0x03, DACOUT - VDAC output

field.name: EXCLK
field.description: Select clock used for excitation timing

field.name: SAMPLECLK
field.description: Select clock used for timing of sample delay

field.name: STRSAMPLE
field.description: Enable storing of sensor sample in result buffer - Value, Description 0x00, DISABLE - Nothing will be stored in the result buffer. 0x01, DATA - The sensor sample data will be stored in the result buffer. 0x02, DATASRC - The data source (i.e., the channel) will be stored alongside the sensor sample data.

field.name: MODE
field.description: Configure evaluation mode - Value, Description 0x00, THRES - Threshold comparison is used to evaluate sensor result 0x01, SLIDINGWIN - Sliding window is used to evaluate sensor result 0x02, STEPDET - Step detection is used to evaluate sensor result

field.name: SAMPLE
field.description: Select sample mode - Value, Description 0x00, ACMPCOUNT - Counter output will be used in evaluation 0x01, ACMP - ACMP output will be used in evaluation 0x02, ADC - ADC output will be used in evaluation 0x03, ADCDIFF - Differential ADC output will be used in evaluation

field.description: Enable storing of sensor sample in result buffer - Value, Description 0x00, DISABLE - Nothing will be stored in the result buffer. 0x01, DATA - The sensor sample data will be stored in the result buffer. 0x02, DATASRC - The data source (i.e., the channel) will be stored alongside the sensor sample data.

field.name: CNTPRESC
field.description: Counter prescaler value. - Value, Description 0x00, DIV1 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/1 0x01, DIV2 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/2 0x02, DIV4 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/4 0x03, DIV8 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/8 0x04, DIV16 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/16 0x05, DIV32 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/32 0x06, DIV64 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/64 0x07, DIV128 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/128 0x08, DIV256 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/256 0x09, DIV512 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/512 0x0A, DIV1024 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/1024 0x0B, DIV2048 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/2048 0x0C, DIV4096 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/4096 0x0D, DIV8192 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/8192 0x0E, DIV16384 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/16384 0x0F, DIV32768 - CLKCNT = LFECLKRTCC/32768

register.name: COMBCNT
register.description: Combined Pre-Counter and Counter Value Register

field.name: LOCKKEY
field.description: Configuration Lock Key - Value, Description 0x00, LOCK - 0x00, UNLOCKED - 0x01, LOCKED - 0x0AEE8, UNLOCK -

field.name: MODE
field.description: CC Channel Mode - Value, Description 0x00, OFF - Compare/Capture channel turned off 0x01, INPUTCAPTURE - Input capture 0x02, OUTPUTCOMPARE - Output compare

field.name: CMOA
field.description: Compare Match Output Action - Value, Description 0x00, PULSE - A single clock cycle pulse is generated on output 0x01, TOGGLE - Toggle output on compare match 0x02, CLEAR - Clear output on compare match 0x03, SET - Set output on compare match

field.name: ICEDGE
field.description: Input Capture Edge Select - Value, Description 0x00, RISING - Rising edges detected 0x01, FALLING - Falling edges detected 0x02, BOTH - Both edges detected 0x03, NONE - No edge detection, signal is left as it is

field.name: PRSSEL
